text: == Classification == {| align=center style="font-size: 90%; border- collapse:collapse" border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=2 |- align=center bgcolor=#98A1B2 !width=40| !width=220|Season ranking 1959 !width=55|Pt !width=40|G !width=40|W !width=40|D !width=40|L !width=40|PF !width=40|PA |- align=center style="background:#DDEEFF" | 1. ||style="text-align:left;"| Olimpija ||27||18||13||1||4||1486||1192 |- align=center | 2. ||style="text- align:left;"| Crvena Zvezda ||23||18||11||1||6||1562||1471 |- align=center | 3. ||style="text-align:left;"| Željezničar Karlovac ||22||18||11||0||7||1302||1272 |- align=center | 4. ||style="text- align:left;"| Partizan ||21||18||10||1||7||1399||1430 |- align=center | 5. ||style="text-align:left;"| Zadar ||20||18||10||0||8||1462||1421 |- align=center | 6. ||style="text-align:left;"| OKK Beograd ||18||18||9||0||9||1406||1298 |- align=center | 7. ||style="text-align:left;"| Ljubljana ||17||18||8||1||9||1339||1378 |- align=center | 8. ||style="text- align:left;"| Proleter Zrenjanin ||16||18||8||0||10||1237||1278 |- align=center style="background:#FFC0CB" | 9. ||style="text-align:left;"| Lokomotiva ||8||18||4||0||14||1183||1331 |- align=center style="background:#FFC0CB" | 10. ||style="text-align:left;"| Zastava Kragujevac ||8||18||4||0||14||1119||1424 |} The winning roster of Olimpija: * Boris Kristančič * Janez Bajc * Janko Šolmajer * Karel Povž * Marko Vrhovec * Igor Jelnikar * Miha Lokar * Marjan Kandus * Matija Dermastija * Emil Logar * Karel Kapelj * Ivo Daneu * Peter Kralj * Primož Brišnik Coach: Boris Kristančič == Qualification in 1959-60 season European competitions == FIBA European Champions Cup * Olimpija (Champions) ==References== Category:Yugoslav First Basketball League seasons
